message: @ManuelKiessling Wow great link, I hadn't seen that before.
@ManuelKiessling :) I'm actually going to head to bed now, I wish you luck in getting a group on here.
Hi Eric. Are you at QCon?
Welcome to the QCon London 2011 Convore Group (a.k.a. Conference In-Room Chat)
Read about why In-Room Chats actually make sense here: http://www.shirky.com/writings/arsc.html
@ManuelKiessling No, sorry, I probably shouldn't be here. I saw your Tweet, I'm one of the co-founders of Convore so I monitor Twitter traffic & decided to pop in.
QCon is about bringing people together after all.
I think the In-Room Chat scenario is extremely usefull for Convore.
It would be great if tweets which are hashtagged with the name of the convore group are inserted into the timeline.
@ManuelKiessling Oh, actually I have written a script that will do that, one second
@ManuelKiessling https://gist.github.com/835862 I can set that going if you want me to, or you can run it if you're technically inclined
@ManuelKiessling No problem, g'night and have fun
